title: help me pls mac book wont download league
body:
PLEASE HELP ME!!! I'm suffering

So I tried to download the new update today for league and for some reason it would not finish downloading it would reach the end and then the launcher would disappear and then if I opened league after it would start the download all over again. So I decided to reinstall. I installed the files off of riot website and it installs and I have the league icon, but nothing else happened. And whenever I try to open league client from applications or from the icon on my dock, the logo will pop up but nothing happens. I've tried like everything, nothing on youtube or these forums is helping me. I don't want all the money and time I spent on this game to go to waste.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're having some problems with the Mac admin settings not allowing League to properly update. Do the steps in the screenshot below and let me know if that doesn't help!

https://i.gyazo.com/76714a374c607d48a3f39fa317bbbd2d.png

Well it says I'm the admin and that the firewall settings are off, allowing all incoming connections. Like when I download league it downloads the setup files and I get the icon but nothing else happens, it doesn't automatically launch like it says it's supposed to do.

That's good if your user is the admin already, but you still might need to enable access *for League*. Make sure you've gone through those steps, and if it doesn't work then reach out to our techs in a ticket.
Well for some reason it won't let me click on Sharing and permissions part of info box. I'm just stuck looking at the spotlight part of the info box.
Hmmmm that sounds a little odd. Let's get you in touch with our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can help walk you through some steps 1 on 1!
